demo_start: ^"The next line of dialogue should spawn some choices."
^"A longer test 2 to test for strange behavior regarding the coroutine??"
start_cook: ^"Have you cooked anything in the kitchen yet?"
^"Yeah. You'll find meats in the meat locker and veggies and garnishes in the pantry. The meat locker is the white door and the pantry is the wooden closet."
^"Now that I've laid out the basics, why don't you whip up spaghetti with a green crunch and something on-the-bone. Think you can do that?"
cooking_start: ^"Can you explain it a bit more?"

c-1: ^"Um... sure. Spaghetti with a crunchy vegetable and meat with bones still inside. I'm indifferent about garnish."
^"Ugh. Give me lettuce and fingers over spaghetti. Is that clear enough?"

outcome_good: ^"Well, look at you! You're a damn natural! Keep this up, and Bobo might keep ya' around an extra couple days."
outcome_mid: ^"Not bad. I appreciate the grub. Take care, ok?"
outcome_bad: ^"...Is this some kinda joke? This is some shit I'd feed to my dog. Get some life skills, man."
